product_name: FalconGuides Best Easy Day Hikes: Lake Tahoe - A Falcon Guide - 2nd Edition
long_description: Best Easy Day Hikes Lake Tahoe includes concise descriptions and detailed maps for 24 hikes within an hour of Tahoe City, Incline Village and South Lake Tahoe/Stateline.
